description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `url` in method `Spryker\Client\CartCodesRestApi\Dependency\Client\CartCodesRestApiToZedRequestClientBridge::call()`.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `call()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Prefix `is` must not be used with postfix `Exist`. Method: Spryker\Zed\CartCodesRestApi\Business\CartCodeAdder\CartCodeAdder::isSuccessMessageExists().
Bridges: Method `addCartCode()` must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `removeCartCode()` must have `public function delete<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionDeleteCriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `findQuoteByUuid()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
